entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
